readable.title: 312156254_ef31dca5ed
readable.content: A black dog in an orange bandanna pouncing on a blue soccer ball in an area covered by fallen leaves . A black dog pounces on a ball in the leaves . A black dog pushes a blue ball in a yard of brown leaves . A dog jumps at a shiny blue soccer ball in a field of dry leaves . A little black dog wearing a red collar is in the leaves with a blue ball .
